resources.string: Globus, from the latin word globus or globe, is a combination of a news viewing app, educational app, and quiz app which aims to educate people about the core concepts of globalization. In addition to this, globus demonstrates how cultural, political, economic, and social information spreads in the world through its new viewing capabilities. It advocates technology as one of the core influences in the increase in globalization.

This app was made by Mark Raphael Recio, a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science student at CIIT College of Arts and Technology, in partial completion of the courses, Contemporary World and Applications Development and Emerging Technologies.
